constraints.name: geometric_relation
constraints.description: 大圆内切一个正方形，正方形的四个顶点在大圆的圆周上
constraints.formal: Square is inscribed in the circle such that its vertices lie on the circle's circumference

constraints.name: circle_diameter_constraint
constraints.description: 四个小圆的直径等于正方形的边长
constraints.formal: Diameter of each small circle = side length of the square

constraints.name: shaded_area_calculation
constraints.description: 计算并输出阴影部分的面积，误差不超过 10^-6
constraints.formal: Calculate and output the shaded area with an absolute or relative error not exceeding 10^-6
